Fortunes fashion pourtrayed in the troubles of the Ladie Elizabeth Gray, wife to Edward the fourth. Written by Tho. Sampson. Sampson, Thomas, poet.
[48] p.
Printed [by R. Field] for William Iones, and are to be sold at his shop at White-crosse streete end by the church, London : 1613.
Printer's name from STC. In verse. Running title reads: The troubles of the Lady Elizabeth Gray. Signatures: A-F⁴. Print show-through. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
